timeline.author: danielduhh

replies.bodyText:
It is a special property that the Spark UI picks up for labeling.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41903342/how-to-change-job-stage-description-in-web-ui
replies.author: Bentleysb

timeline.bodyText: What are we combining here, if not by country?
timeline.author: seancoulter

replies.bodyText: It is by country, but there is only ever one country. This is just because the country code is passed through the streaming interface by using a pair RDD. The country code needs to be passed to processFlags via the RDD due to sparks lazy execution.
replies.author: Bentleysb
